cell.html: World-class surfing/skiing brothers raise money to save the family ranch in Hawaii by hitting the extreme-sports circuit.
cell.text: World-class surfing/skiing brothers raise money to save the family ranch in Hawaii by hitting the extreme-sports circuit.
Zalman King , Charles Rosin, Matt George

cell.html: While seeking a sponsorship deal, Cole attracts the eye of a beautiful resident in Oahu; Kelly and Kai take up motocross; Kate prepares for college on the mainland.
cell.text: While seeking a sponsorship deal, Cole attracts the eye of a beautiful resident in Oahu; Kelly and Kai take up motocross; Kate prepares for college on the mainland.

cell.html: Cole and Val receive an invitation to compete on the same team at a competition in Bali; a jet-ski racer challenges Kelly to a deadly nighttime game of chicken.
cell.text: Cole and Val receive an invitation to compete on the same team at a competition in Bali; a jet-ski racer challenges Kelly to a deadly nighttime game of chicken.

cell.html: Kate poses for a women's bodysurfing calendar; Cole joins a canoe club; Kai must vacate his tent-home; Val finds he has things in common with his new stepmother.

cell.html: Cole prepares for a canoe race; Kate postpones college; Kelly makes a friend; Ciel creates a petting zoo; Val has reservations about his affair.

cell.html: Kelly and Kate throw a party that attracts thousands to Ground Zero; a dirt-bike champ with a reckless attitude rubs Cole the wrong way.

context.text: Wind on Water - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
# Episode title Director Writer(s) Overview Original Set Airdate
After their father dies in a tragic accident, champion surfers, Cole and Kelly Connolly help their mother keep their cattle ranch from being bought out by neighbor and former friend, Gardner Poole.
Wind on Water at the Internet Movie Database Wind on Water at TV.com
Wind on Water was a short-lived American TV-series by Zalman King and NBC . Although the series had already shot six episodes, only the first two aired in October 1998 .
This article or section has multiple issues. Please help improve the article or discuss these issues on the talk page .
This drama television program -related article is a stub . You can help Wikipedia by expanding it .
